comment.author: Alisha
comment.text: Hillary just told her BIGGEST lie when she "apologized" for offending millions of Americans. She's not sorry, she just wants your votes. #NeverHillary

replies.author: Lucas
replies.text: She didn't apologize. She regretted it. And only half of it..... Trump 2016!

replies.author: Nathan
replies.text: Not only did she not apologize, I want a list of the elites and celebrities that were in that room. I could hear them laughing when she said it and it just encouraged her she was smiling and nodding her head!

replies.author: Mary
replies.text: Brunilda V riguez BIGOT? Really? Hillary's people have a very limited vocabulary don't they?

replies.author: Samantha
replies.text: Rohit Streisand was one of them in the room.
